channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called And Chosen Father Vincent R. Capodanno
channel.desc: This EWTN original docu-drama presents the life and ministry of Servant of God Fr. Vincent R. Capodanno, a US Navy Chaplain who was killed on September 4, 1967 who gave his life trying to minister to a fallen soldier during the Vietnam War. (90 minutes).
